    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AbstractQuestion
    A basic implementation of the Question interface.
    Answer
    This class represents a possible answer to a question.
    AnswerDeserializer
    Used to Deserialize an Answer object
    AnswerSerializer
    Used to Serialize an Answer object
    BaseQuestion
    A non-abstract version of AbstractQuestion.
    DataFile
    Represents the overall data storage structure in code
    DefinitionsExampleController
     
    DragonHandler
    Registry for handling middle man communications.
    EncryptionRegistry
    The Encryption Registry handles all encryption and decryption for this program
    ExampleFormQuestionGenerator
    An example QuestionGenerator to show off the new forms system.
    ExampleQuestionGenerator
    An example question generator to construct addition problems
    ExampleQuestionPane
    FXML Controller for /assets/views/ExampleQuestionPane.fxml
    Form
    Represents a form where words can be filled from lists of terms.
    FormDeserializer
    Used to Deserialize an Form object
    FormField
    A form Field is a placeholder for a word inside a form.
    FormSerializer
    Used to Serialize an Form object
    JsonRegistry
    A singleton to handle Json for Dragon Score.
    Lesson
    A lesson represents a set of questions or question generators that fit a common theme.
    Main
    This is the main entrypoint to the application.
    MainMenuController
     
    NameFormController
     
    PointSystem
    TODO: Please Comment me!
    PointSystemDeserializer
     
    PointSystemSerializer
     
    Question
    The Question Interface.
    QuestionGenerator
    Every question generator should implement this interface.
    QuestionGeneratorDeserializer
    Used to Deserialize an QuestionGenerator object
    QuestionGeneratorRegistry
    Singleton registry for dynamically loading and storing question generators
    QuestionGeneratorSerializer
    Used to Serialize an QuestionGenerator object
    Term
    Represents a word and what type it is.
    TermRegistry
    Singleton registry for loading and storing Terms and lists of Terms
    TermType
    Term Type enum Defines what types of terms exist
    TrueFalseQuestion
    A simple implementation of AbstractQuestion with only ywo answers being true and false
    UiComponentCreator
    A static class that is used to help create and demo how to create FXML components
